metadata.title: CVE-2020-15651 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A unicode RTL order character in the downloaded file name can be used tochange the file's name during the download UI flow to change the fileextension. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 28.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
